data= read.csv('Covid-19/covid-data.csv')
head(data)

library(maps)
library(ggplot2)

```{r}
#world map of total cases by country
data$location[data$location == "United States"] <- "USA"

world_map <- map_data("world")
world_map <- subset(world_map, region != "Antarctica")

ggplot(data) +
  geom_map(
    dat = world_map, map = world_map, aes(map_id = region),
    fill = "white", color = "#7f7f7f", size = 0.25
  ) +
  geom_map(map = world_map, aes(map_id = location, fill = total_cases), size = 0.25) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "#fff7bc", high = "#cc4c02", name = "Total Cases") +
  expand_limits(x = world_map$long, y = world_map$lat)
```
summary(data)
